external_games.name: Train Simulator: Three Country Corner Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Three Country Corner Route Add-On
summary: Drive 130km (80 miles) of track through Austria, Germany and Switzerland, passing through 40 detailed stations!A tour de force in route design, with stunning scenery, country-specific signalling systems and custom objects throughout, the Three Country Corner Route is probably the most authentic, realistic and detailed route for Train...
